name: 101 logic puzzles - games
description:
101 logic puzzles in one game.

• Black box
• Sudoku
• Unequal
• Loopy
• Same
• Inertia
* Net
• Slide
* Flip
etc

• Improve your brain activity by playing this game.
• Each game has different boards to select.
• Hours of play.
• Some puzzles are easy to solve and some are tricky
enough to take the whole day.
• Fun game with simple graphics.
• More levels will be added soon.
thanks
